title: 2BD 2BA, Gourmet-style breakfast bar, Controlled-entry access
posting_body: Take a moment to breathe as you step away from the hustle and bustle of downtown into the serene Bay Area city of El Cerrito.
Located in the heart of this electric and centralized neighborhood, you will find Del Norte Place Apartment Homes.
Here we’ve cultivated a community where residents can gather, connect, and have fun with thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life.

Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher-Fireplaces in select homes-Gourmet-style breakfast bar-Ceiling fans in living areas-Oversized walk-in closets                                                                                        Featured amenity-Oversized double pane windows-Private balcony or patio-Electric range appliances                                                                                        Featured amenity-Built-in linen closet and additional storage

Onsite retail with unique eateries and shopping right at your doorstep-Resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Energy-efficient laundry facilities-Flexible lease terms-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area-Co-working lounge-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:
Only a small one-time payment-Controlled-entry access
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
